stepAnswer: They can access a wide range of resources from anywhere with an internet connection.
stepBody: Why might a student choose to use an online database instead of a traditional library for their research paper?
choices: Online databases are always free to use
Online databases are only available during business hours
They can access a wide range of resources from anywhere with an internet connection
They can access a wide range of resources from anywhere with an internet connection.
Traditional libraries do not have academic journals
